resources.string: 2. Whisk the graham cracker crumbs, 50 grams (1/4 cup) of sugar, and 1/2 teaspoon of salt together in a medium bowl. Pour the melted butter and 1 teaspoon of vanilla into the dry ingredients and stir together until evenly mixed.
